title: Apaga Apaga Apaga (Ao Vivo)
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Eu acho que cê tem que mandar aquela mensagem
lines.translation: I think you have to send that message.
lines.grammar: Portuguese note: Verb focus: mandar (check person/tense and prefixes). Contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach; nasal endings common. Meaning: 'I think you have to send that message.'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: Mas manda o que tá no seu coração
lines.translation: But send what's in your heart.
lines.grammar: Portuguese note: Identify the main verb, its ending, and any prefix movement. Contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach; nasal endings common. Meaning: 'But send what's in your heart.'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: Porque se fosse eu
lines.translation: Because if it were me
lines.grammar: Portuguese note: Identify the main verb, its ending, and any prefix movement. Contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach; nasal endings common. Meaning: 'Because if it were me'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: Eu falaria mais ou menos assim
lines.translation: I would say something like this
lines.grammar: Portuguese note: Identify the main verb, its ending, and any prefix movement. Contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach; nasal endings common. Meaning: 'I would say something like this'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: Ei, boa noite, antes de te bloquear
lines.translation: Hey, good evening, before I block you.
lines.grammar: Portuguese note: Verb focus: noite, bloquear (check person/tense and prefixes). Contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach; nasal endings common. Meaning: 'Hey, good evening, before I block you.'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: Eu só vim te dizer que a partir de hoje
lines.translation: I just came to tell you that starting today
lines.grammar: Portuguese note: Verb focus: dizer, partir (check person/tense and prefixes). Contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach; nasal endings common. Meaning: 'I just came to tell you that starting today'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: Pode tocar o terror, fazer o que quiser fazer
lines.translation: You can cause chaos, do whatever you want to do.
lines.grammar: Portuguese note: Verb focus: tocar, fazer, quiser (check person/tense and prefixes). Contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach; nasal endings common. Meaning: 'You can cause chaos, do whatever you want to do.'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: A boca é sua, curte suas farra, sinto mais nada
lines.translation: It's your mouth, enjoy your parties, I don't feel anything anymore.
lines.grammar: Portuguese note: Verb focus: curte (check person/tense and prefixes). Contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach; nasal endings common. Meaning: 'It's your mouth, enjoy your parties, I don't feel anything anymore.'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: Não! Apaga, apaga, apaga
lines.translation: No! Delete it, delete it, delete it.
lines.grammar: Portuguese note: Identify the main verb, its ending, and any prefix movement. Contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach; nasal endings common. Meaning: 'No! Delete it, delete it, delete it.'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: Oi, boa noite!
lines.translation: Hey goodnight!
lines.grammar: Portuguese note: Verb focus: noite (check person/tense and prefixes). Contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach; nasal endings common. Meaning: 'Hey goodnight!'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: Só vim pedir um tempo
lines.translation: I just came to ask for some time.
lines.grammar: Portuguese note: Verb focus: pedir (check person/tense and prefixes). Contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach; nasal endings common. Meaning: 'I just came to ask for some time.'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: Pra dar tempo de esquecer
lines.translation: To give time to forget.

lines.text: Especialmente hoje

lines.text: Coração acordou me pressionando pra te ver
lines.translation: My heart woke up urging me to see you.
lines.grammar: Portuguese note: Verb focus: acordou, pressionando (check person/tense and prefixes). Contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach; nasal endings common. lines.text: Saiu de casa, não posta nada, esconde as farra
lines.translation: She left home, didn't post anything, and hid her partying.
lines.grammar: Portuguese note: Identify the main verb, its ending, and any prefix movement. Contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach; nasal endings common.
